interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2020/09/01
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe.  I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask.  If you're having a hard time, give these a try.  They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy.
Review Title: Mask Brackets
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) GENTS OF LONDON {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} This hair paste is awesome! for the price, it almost even out performs some way more expensive hair products! I used to use Paul Mitchell hair paste, but this is probably going to be my go to now.

This stuff does have somewhat of a smell, but it smells sort of like the original old spice. It's not too strong though, but if you want something scentless, then you may wanna try something else. Smells Kinda like Old Spice Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Sdara Skincare {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Seriously there’s nothing better on a sunburn than Aloe Vera. It’s natural and won’t harm your skin. This aloe has a clear color so there’s no artificial dyes contained in this gel. Just pure headlining and soothing properties. I feel for the size of the bottle, it’s a great bargain and it’s effective. Cooling Natural Aloe Vera 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Vedory ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe. I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask. If you're having a hard time, give these a try. They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy. Mask Brackets
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference:** The user prioritizes effective hair styling products, favoring professional-grade items that provide a firm hold. They demonstrate a tendency to switch from higher-priced brands to more affordable alternatives that deliver similar results.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** The user shows a moderate tolerance for scents, preferring subtle fragrances. Their recent purchase highlights an appreciation for natural scents, as evidenced by their positive response to Aloe Vera's mild aroma.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user exhibits flexibility in brand allegiance, illustrating a willingness to explore new products based on performance rather than brand loyalty alone. An openness to high-quality, natural items is evident in their choice of organic products.

- **Value-Consciousness:** The user values good quality and effectiveness, exemplified by recent purchases viewed as great bargains for size and efficacy. They are inclined to switch to products that offer superior quality at a better price, showcasing a budget-conscious approach.

- **Health & Safety Preferences:** The user demonstrates a proactive approach to health and comfort, as evidenced by their recent purchase of accessories that enhance mask-wearing experience. They appreciate products that improve usability and functionality, reflecting a consideration for comfort and practicality.

Overall, the user prioritizes performance and quality in personal care, emphasizes value-driven choices, and demonstrates a thoughtful approach to health-related accessories.
